name: Hip Mobility Drills
description: Critical for runners, desk workers, and anyone with lower back pain. Tight hips affect everything above and below.

exercises.name: 90-90 Hip Stretch
exercises.instructions: Sit with front leg bent 90°, back leg bent 90°. Sit tall. Lean forward over front leg. Switches internal/external rotation. Essential hip opener.

exercises.name: World's Greatest Stretch
exercises.instructions: Lunge position. Elbow to inside of front foot (hip flexor). Rotate and reach up (thoracic rotation). Drop back knee for deeper hip flexor stretch. Comprehensive warmup.

exercises.name: Fire Hydrants
exercises.instructions: On hands and knees. Lift one knee out to side (like dog at fire hydrant). Slow and controlled. Activates hip abductors.

exercises.name: Pigeon Pose (Hip Opener)
exercises.instructions: From hands and knees, bring one knee forward between hands, extend back leg. Sink hips down. Deep external rotator stretch. Modify with cushion under hip.

exercises.name: Dynamic Leg Swings
exercises.instructions: Hold wall. Swing one leg: forward/back (20 reps), side-to-side (20 reps), circles (10 each direction). Dynamic hip warmup.
